title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 367.11 - Burden of proof
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 367.11 - Burden of proof

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by statute, the burden of proof
shall be on the party who initiated the proceeding. No decision, determination
or order shall be made except upon consideration of the record as a whole or
such portion thereof as may be cited by any party to the proceeding and except
where otherwise provided by statute, as supported by and in accordance with
substantial evidence. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 1

367.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
